attributes.action: Clarify the governments position as regards to disabled workers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Provide the disabled employees of Remploy in Penzance with answers to the following questions:-
Why, despite the ongoing review being used as an excuse for not recruiting into the factories, has the number of CDCs and High Street Shops been allowed to increase?
Why are the unions hindered at every turn, such as the pay negotiations which have been delayed for several months while the company and the government play ping pong with our lives?

government_responses.details:
